## sanitizeInteger() function

Sanitizes integer value to avoid injections.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function sanitizeInteger(value: any): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | any | InfluxDB integer literal |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

sanitized integer value

## Exceptions

Error if the the value cannot be sanitized
